Gentoo Linux Installation Guide with Screenshots (amd64 Architecture, Glibc library, gcc Compiler, systemd Service Manager, GRUB Bootloader)

This step-by-step installation guide with screenshots will walk you through the process of installing Gentoo Linux on an AMD64 system using the Glibc library, GCC compiler, systemd init system, and GRUB Bootloader.
